Posts.EditableText: If I want to make everything the character says appear in a certain colour, using a hex code, how would I do that?
Posts.HTML: If I want to make everything the character says appear in a certain colour, using a hex code, how would I do that?

Posts.EditableText:
Just put these in a message.
```
<font color="numberhere">words of character</font color>
```
or
```
<font size="numberhere"> Title Screen</font size>
```
Here is a website that helps with colors too. 

http://htmlcolorcodes.com/
